subject: Invoice for Guitar lessons
body:
Hello Andrew Lemons,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Guitar lessons): for a total of $25.00.

Details


Guitar lessons: 1 invoice totaling $25.00


Invoice #6 for $25.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $25.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Music Instruction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
